rule.intent: (pour the batter into the pan), (cook until bubbly), then (flip and cook the other side)

rule.demo: check whether the workpiece is in the correct position and ask for assistance if necessary
rule.intent: (check whether the workpiece is in the correct position) and (ask for assistance) (if necessary)

rule.demo: grab the necessary parts and safely use the cooking utensils
rule.intent: (grab the necessary parts) and (safely use the cooking utensils)

rule.demo: position food correctly, prepare the ingredients, and execute the cooking steps
rule.intent: (position food correctly), (prepare the ingredients), and (execute the cooking steps)

rule.demo: prepare the food ingredients before cooking
rule.intent: (prepare the food ingredients) before (cooking)

rule.intent: (check that the environment is safe) and (whether the parts are complete) before (assembling the parts)

rule.demo: cut the vegetables and meat, fry them, and then add the spices
rule.intent: (cut the vegetables and meat), (fry them), and then (add the spices)

rule.demo: boil the water, cook the noodles, and then mix with the sauce
rule.intent: (boil the water), (cook the noodles), and then (mix with the sauce)

rule.demo: check that the food is clean, select the appropriate cooking utensils, and cook the food evenly
rule.intent: (check that the food is clean), (select the appropriate cooking utensils), and (cook the food evenly)

rule.demo: cut vegetables, prepare seasonings, and then fry them in a pan
rule.intent: (cut vegetables), (prepare seasonings), and then (fry them in a pan)

rule.demo: check the temperature and humidity of the oven before putting in the dough to bake
rule.intent: (check the temperature and humidity of the oven) before (putting in the dough to bake)

rule.demo: stir the butter and sugar evenly, then add eggs and flour and mix well
rule.intent: (stir the butter and sugar evenly), then (add eggs and flour) and (mix well)

rule.demo: prepare the food, and then cook it
rule.intent: (prepare the food), and then (cook it)

rule.demo: check the safety of the environment, and then start cooking
rule.intent: (check the safety of the environment), and then (start cooking)

rule.demo: prepare the food, and then check if the ingredients are complete
rule.intent: (prepare the food), and then (check if the ingredients are complete)

rule.demo: combine the ingredients together according to the recipe and bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees
rule.intent: (combine the ingredients together) (according to the recipe) and (bake for 30 minutes) (at 350 degrees)

rule.demo: position the ingredients and execute the steps
rule.intent: (position the ingredients) and (execute the steps)

rule.demo: grab the parts safely and continue with execution_steps
rule.intent: (grab the parts) safely and (continue with execution_steps)

rule.intent: (complete food preparation), then (request intervention) for guidance

rule.demo: prepare food and request help simultaneously
rule.intent: (prepare food) and (request help) (simultaneously)

rule.demo: check if the environment is safe, and if so, execute the cooking steps
rule.intent: (check if the environment is safe), and if so, (execute the cooking steps)

rule.demo: grab the necessary ingredients and use cooking tools to cook the meal
rule.intent: (grab the necessary ingredients) and (use cooking tools) to (cook the meal)

rule.intent: (check if the dishwasher is full), (start the dishwasher), and (wait for the washing cycle to complete)

rule.demo: put all the ingredients into the pot according to the recipe, and turn on the fire
rule.intent: (put all the ingredients into the pot) according to the recipe, and (turn on the fire)

rule.demo: check if the water has boiled
rule.intent: (check if the water has boiled)

rule.intent: (place the fish head) on the tray and (add appropriate seasoning)

rule.demo: stir the soup and adjust the seasoning according to taste
rule.intent: (stir the soup) and (adjust the seasoning) (according to taste)
